short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension turns phone numbers into click to call links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Lightspeed Voice Chrome extension converts phone numbers into clickable links that can be used to make calls with a single click.
 
This extension works on most websites and also allows you to type or copy and paste numbers. By clicking on the phone number link, the number will be automatically dialed on your Lightspeed Voice provided phone. Please note that this extension is exclusively for Lightspeed Voice customers. If you don't have Lightspeed Voice telephone service, this extension won't be functional for you.
 
Browser phone:  
- Initiate Lightspeed Voice calls from any Chrome web page 
- Click-to-call phone numbers from any Chrome web page 
- Customizable options, including Confirm Calls and Managing Disabled Domains
